bm_desc: Pursuant to Regulation 29 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform you that a meeting of Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Wednesday, the 03rd day of December, 2025 at 11:00 A.M. at the registered office of the Company inter- alia to consider the following matters:1. To consider the appointment of Mr. Ripan Kumar Goyal (DIN: 11397550) as Independent Director of the Company.2. Any other matter, if required with the permission of the chair.
To consider Fund Raising and other business matters
To consider stock split of equity shares
To consider proposal for issuance of Bonus Issue of Equity shares
Board Meeting to consider Fund Raising via Rights Issue and other business matters
To consider buyback for equity shares and other business matters
To consider and approve the financial results for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2025 and other business matters
To consider and approve the appointment Mr. Robert Jonathan Moses [DIN: 07134423] and Ms. Namrata Sharma [DIN:10204473] as an Additional Non-Executive Independent Director of the Company
To consider Fund Raising by way of issuance of Non-Convertible Debentures on private placement basis.
To consider and approve the financial results for the period ended September 30, 2025
To consider declaration of interim dividend for the financial year 2025-2026.
To consider and approve the financial results for the period ended December 31, 2025
To consider and approve the financial results for the period ended December 31, 2025
